item.title: Hugo+Github builds a personal blog
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: Hugo Introduction My blog has been built with hexo before. As I use golang more and more, I have always wanted to migrate my blog to hugo. Hugo is a static website generator written in golang, which is simple, easy to use, efficient, easy to expand and quickly deployed. Install hugo Here is an example of mac environment: Copy 1 2 3 4 5 6 brew install hugo hugo new
